resources.string: © 2010—2011 Valera Leontyev. MobiOp widget. Version 0.3.4 alpha. Web: http://valera.ws/mobiop/ E-mail: feedbee@gmail.com

MobiOp is an Android Home Screen widget. It displays current Mobile Cellular Operator name and logo. All logos are embedded in program. Currently supported mobile networks of the countries: RU (particular), BY, UA, KZ, UZ, LT, LV, EE. Pressing the widget initiates USSD "get current balance" request (*100#).
Mobile operator logo and name widget
